content.text:
# 1987 Pilkington Glass Championships – Singles

Helena Suková
| runner   =  Martina Navratilova
| score    = 7–6(7–5), 6–3
| type     = singles doubles
| main_name = Eastbourne International
| draw     = 56 (8/1)
| seeds    = 16
}}
Martina Navratilova was the five-time defending champion, but lost in the final to Helena Suková. The score was 7–6(7–5), 6–3.
Seeds
Martina Navratilova (final)
#  Chris Evert (semifinals)
#  Helena Suková (champion)
#  Pam Shriver (semifinals)
#  Gabriela Sabatini (quarterfinals)
#  Bettina Bunge (third round)
#  Lori McNeil (first round)
#  Catarina Lindqvist (third round)
#  Wendy Turnbull (third round)
#  Raffaella Reggi (second round)
#  Robin White (third round)
#  Larisa Savchenko (quarterfinals)
#  Elizabeth Smylie (third round)
#  Mary Joe Fernández (first round)
#  Nathalie Tauziat (first round)
#  Dianne Balestrat (third round)
}}
